pkgmetadata.longdescription: ASHLAR: Alignment by Simultaneous Harmonization of Layer/Adjacency RegistrationAshlar implements efficient combined stitching and registration of multi-channelimage mosaics collected using the Tissue-CycIF microscopy protocol [1]_. Althoughoriginally developed for CycIF, it may also be applicable to other tiled and/orcyclic imaging approaches. The package offers both a command line script for themost common use cases as well as an API for building more specialized tools... [1] Tissue-CycIF is multi-round immunofluorescence microscopy on large fixed tissue samples. See https://doi.org/10.1101/151738 for details.
